contest-event.event-date:
March 28, 1931 D Harrogate and District BBA Contest (Open)
Harrogate and District BBA Contest (Open) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Harrogate and District BBA Contest harrogate-and-district-bba-contest-open
La Favorita
Yeadon Town Hall, Leeds March contest 1st Yeadon Old, 2nd Harrogate, 3rd Ripon, 4th Knaresborough.
Best cornet, euphonium and bass trombone Harrogate. Best flugel and tenor trombone Knaresborough.
5th annual contest promoted by Harrogate and District BBA.
Source Musical Progress and Mail May 1931.
June 6, 2012, 6:25 p.m. Dec. 12, 2018, 7:11 p.m.
1 Harrogate Silver R. Littlewood
2 Knaresborough Silver J. Watson
3 Burley & Ilkley W. I. Warburton
4 Yeadon Old Band Walter Jackson
